div.p: The Mott Haven Academy Charter School empowers children in an educational environment which addresses and reduces the barriers to academic success through the integration of family support services with a rigorous, college-preparatory academic program.
In order to meet the needs of our community, the school design includes a close partnership with one of the cityâs largest social service agencies, The New York Foundling.

div.p: Lauren Blenkinship was born and raised in Los Angeles California and attended UCLA for her Bachelorâs in psychology. As a part of Teach For America, she is committed to fighting systemic educational inequity. As a student, Lauren always felt that the material did not reach her, because she is a more hands-on kind of learner. As a Special Educator, she is passionate about making knowledge accessible to all students. In her free time, she enjoys cooking and exploring the city. Music has always been a passion of hers and she plays piano, guitar, and sings regularly. Lauren loves to travel and is excited by the breadth of knowledge and diversity all across the world. Lauren comes from a family of artists, so she loves to draw and create DIY projects for her apartment.

b.a: Bronx Charter School Serves Thanksgiving meal to Homeless Students

a.b: Fostering Independence, One Student at a TimeÂ

h2.a: Una escuela en El Bronx donde se da especial atenciÃ³n a los estudiantes sin hogar

div.p:
New York 1 â Noticias
October 29, 2019
View Article
Haven Academy opened in the Fall of 2008 and has grown to serve students in grades PreK-6.
All children eligible to attend NYC Public Schools are eligible to attend Mott Haven Academy Charter School.
Enabling teachers to be more creative and innovative in their teaching methods, length of school day and year, and subject matter.
The Foundlingâs Bronx Community Services has supported the Mott Haven community for over 40 years.
Charter schools are one of the fastest growing innovations in education and are supported on the city, state and federal government level.
Our graduates will be resilient, resourceful, independent scholars who have the skills necessary to reach their full potential and to build a better future.

The Mott Haven Academy Charter School is a high performing Charter School that empowers children in an educational environment which addresses and reduces the barriers to academic success through the integration of family support services with a rigorous, college-preparatory academic program.
